title: Loads into game but no windows open
body: So i was loading into a game and was tabbed out watching a youtube vid while loading. i heard the sound of the game starting so i closed youtube and i found no tabs open for league. the mouse cursor changed to that of the game and sound affects were being played but no window opened. i cant find any threads on this so has anyone else had this happen to them. im playing on a mac and i lost my promos because of a remake even though i reconnected before the remake votes were casts.
